titleStmt.title: The impeachment by the House of Commons against the Lord Major of the City of London and divers other aldermen, common-councell men, citizens, ministers, apprentices, and others and an order for chusing a new lord mayor, and the manner of the tryall, also the sentence denounced against John Poyntz, alias Morris, Isabel Smith, Leonard Derby and John Harris.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Ibbitson and are to be sold at his House in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Sutro Library.
